definitions.text: property that is leased or rented out or let
a contract granting use or occupation of property during a specified time for a specified payment
the period of time during which a contract conveying property to a person is in effect

examples: We rented our apartment to friends while we were abroad

definitions.text: hold under a lease or rental agreement; of goods and services
grant use or occupation of under a term of contract
examples: I am leasing my country estate to some foreigners

definitions.text: engage for service under a term of contract
examples: We took an apartment on a quiet street
Shall we take a guide in Rome?
